name: UpdateMonitorNotificationRule
description:
Updates a Datadog monitor notification rule.

Use this tool to update a notification rule for a monitor in Datadog by specifying the `rule_id`. It should be called when you need to change the settings or behavior of an existing monitor notification rule.

parameters.name: monitor_notification_rule_id
parameters.description: ID of the monitor notification rule to update.

value_schema.description: ID of the monitor notification rule to update.

parameters.name: update_rule_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object specifying attributes, id, type, recipients, and conditions to update the notification rule.

recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

scope.description: The scope to which the monitor applied.

fallback_recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

conditional_recipients.description: Use conditional recipients to define different recipients for different situations.

filter.description: Filter used to associate the notification rule with monitors.

name.description: The name of the monitor notification rule.

recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

attributes.description: Attributes of the monitor notification rule.

id.description: The ID of the monitor notification rule.

data.description: Object to update a monitor notification rule.

value_schema.description: Request body to update the monitor notification rule.
